entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
